arts.sum: Cristian Chivu will make his managerial debut in the Champions League when Inter Milan take on Ajax later tonight. arts.ttl: PSG starts Champions League defense against Atalanta. Bayern-Chelsea, Ajax-Inter renew past finals
arts.sum: Both Ajax’s John Heitinga and Inter’s Cristian Chivu will be coaching their first career games in the Champions League with teams they once played for in the competition. Paris Saint-Germain starts the defense of its Champions League title on Wednesday when the six-game program includes two rematches of past finals.

arts.ttl: Disappointment for Ajax ahead of Champions League clash with Inter: ‘Berghuis won’t make it’
arts.sum: Manager John Heitinga confirmed that Ajax will be without Steven Berghuis for Wednesday's Champions League clash against Inter.
